DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare bioequivalence test formulation primidone tablet equivalent oral dose commercially available Mysoline® ( primidone tablet ) adult subject fasting condition . Twenty-two healthy , non-smoking , non-obese male female volunteer least 18 year age randomly assign crossover fashion receive two primidone dose regimen sequence 14 day washout period dose period . On morning Day 1 , overnight fast least 10 hour , subject receive either single oral dose test formulation , primidone ( 1 x 50 mg tablet ) single oral dose reference formulation , Mysoline® ( 1 x 50 mg tablet ) . After 14 day washout period , morning Day 15 overnight fast , subject receive alternate regimen . Blood sample draw participant dose 72 hour post dose time sufficient adequately define pharmacokinetics primidone . A goal study evaluate safety tolerability regimen healthy volunteer . Subjects monitor throughout confinement portion study adverse reaction study drug and/or procedure . Blood pressure heart rate obtain prior dose 3 , 4 , 6 , 24 72 hour post-dose . All adverse event whether elicited query , spontaneously report observed clinic staff evaluate investigator report subject 's case report form .
